caption.p: Projected changes in precipitation (in %) over the twenty-first century under a high climate forcing scenario (RCP8.5). Stippling indicates where the multi-model mean change is large compared with natural internal variability in 20â€‰year means (greater than two standard deviations) and where at least 90% of models agree on the sign of change. Hatching indicates where the multi-model mean change is small compared with internal variability (less than one standard deviation), but this does not mean that individual model changes are small. From the Summary for Policymakers of [ 2]. (Online version in colour.)
